data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: A strong man is training with the equipment in a fitness center under the instruction of a coach. It seems to be training for muscle strength and there are many benefits to joining a fitness club. Improved health is the number one benefit of joining a gym. Working out regularly has numerous benefits, from preventing colon and breast cancer to improving muscle strength, joint mobility, and blood circulation. And staying motivated can be difficult if you start down the fitness road alone. Simply having an accountability partner for support and motivation can keep you on the right track to better overall health and weight loss success. While there are some workouts that you can complete at home, the best part about joining a gym is the accessibility of any kind of equipment you need to maintain a healthy lifestyle. From weight machines to treadmills, it’s easy to get in shape when you have access to all the equipment you need.
